abstract: If you're at the game or on the couch and in need of real college football analysis or even some wisecracks - or have some of your own to share - Paul Myerberg and The Times' Jere Longman will be live-blogging all day on Saturday. Join the party and impress your friends.

lead_paragraph: If you're at the game or on the couch and in need of real college football analysis or even some wisecracks - or have some of your own to share - Paul Myerberg and The Times' Jeré Longman will be live-blogging all day on Saturday. Join the party and impress your friends.
